sn56.37:1.1: “Suriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—arunuggam.
sn56.37:1.2: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno catunnam ariyasaccanam yathabhutam abhisamayaya etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—sammaditthi.
sn56.37:1.4: ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanissati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanissati.
sn56.37:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
